body.p: I will call on you at the Theatre,The Lyceum, where CD was advising on Mme Celeste’s production of Tom Taylor’s adaptation of A Tale of Two Cities. The Times (28 January) noted his “supervision” of the production, which ran from 30 Jan to 24 Mar 1860. this afternoon at half past Two.
